title: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
short_description: A timeless treat, these chocolate chip cookies are crisp on the edges and chewy in the middle, filled with melting chocolate chips.

steps.title: Preheat the Oven
steps.description: Preheat your oven to 190°C (375°F). Line a baking tray with parchment paper.

steps.title: Make the Cookie Dough
steps.description: In a large bowl, cream together the softened butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla extract until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition. In another bowl, sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt; gradually stir into the butter mixture. Fold in the chocolate chips.

steps.title: Baking
steps.description: Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared baking trays. Bake for 8–10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies should be golden brown.

steps.title: Cooling
steps.description: Allow cookies to cool on baking tray for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
